description: Change History for the Denial/Correspondence (BDC) record.

columns.name: BDC_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the denial or correspondence record.

columns.name: LINE_COUNT
columns.description: Line number of change history that is being extracted by enterprise reporting.

columns.name: CHNG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of change that occurred.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Created


Updated


Transferred to Other Account


Transferred to Other Bucket


Status Changed


Closed


Re-opened


Voided


Changed Follow-up Dt


Changed Stage


Expected Allowed Amount Updated


Owning Area Changed


Owning User Changed

columns.name: CHNG_SOURCE_VAL
columns.description: This column stores the source value before change. It can be the unique identifier for the liability bucket or the denial/correspondence type (I BDC 30) depending on the type of change.

columns.name: CHNG_TARGET_VAL
columns.description: This column stores the target value after change. It can be the unique identifier for the liability bucket or the denial/correspondence type (I BDC 30) depending on the type of change.

columns.name: CHNG_FOLLOW_UP_DT
columns.description: The follow-up date associated with the change.
